sentences.english: Observing an anti-crime operation in Yau Tsim Police District.
sentences.chinese: 觀察油尖警區的反罪案行動。

sentences.english: Observing the crowd management operation of Halloween in Central Police District.
sentences.chinese: 觀察中區警區萬聖節的人羣管理行動。

sentences.english: The East China Sea Fleet with the PLA Navy held a ceremony at the pier to welcome the RSS Steadfast.
sentences.chinese: 中國海軍東海艦隊某水警區在碼頭舉行了歡迎儀式。

sentences.english: He said some officers from Mong Kok police station are also being questioned.
sentences.chinese: 旺角警區部分警務人員亦被查問。

definition: to pursue/to be after/to hunt down (the perpetrator of a crime, an escaped prisoner etc)
Kwun Tong district of Kowloon, Hong Kong
to investigate (as detective)/to solve (crime)/to uncover (a plot)/to sniff out/to break in and analyze/detective work/to scout
Tsuen Wan district of New Territories, Hong Kong
to set on fire/to commit arson
Tuen Mun district of New Territories, Hong Kong
(of a bird, fish etc) to be caught in a net/(of a tennis ball) to hit the net/(of a criminal) to be captured
to track down/to investigate and arrest
Cheung Sha Wan (poultry market in Hong Kong)
